Module cyfight
Package fr.cyu.cyfight.event.listener

Interface EventListener

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    AttackerChangeEventListener, EntityStatisticsUpdateEventListener, FightEndEventListener, FightStartEventListener, GameExitRequestEventListener, ItemPickedUpEventListener, LevelChangeEventListener, LevelChangeRequestEventListener, PlayerMoveEventListener, SceneChangeRequestEventListener
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    Game, GameSceneController, MainApp
    public interface EventListener
    The EventListener interface is the base interface for objects that want to listen to events. It should not be used directly, but extended by other interfaces.
    Author:
    Mika INISAN
    See Also:
    EventDispatcher, EventManager, EventArgs
